meta.title: Emiliano Alfonso - Fullstack Web Developer
meta.description: Explore my portfolio showcasing front-end and full-stack projects crafted with technologies such as React, Redux, and Express. You will also find my CV and ways to get in touch.

hero.description: I am a web developer who focuses on the small details, and on simple, accessible and adaptable designs.

about.title: About Me
about.description: Fullstack developer, music teacher, Front-end lover. I attended a bootcamp with more than 700 hours of intensive learning that prepared me to work as a web developer, creating projects that were both real and complex. Furthermore, the bootcamp greatly improved my interpersonal skills and gave me the opportunity of teaching to beginner students.
